subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4461 is on the way
description_text:
HI,

I made this purchase just over a month ago along with the pedal set, I
received the pedals, but there had not been any movement on the haptic
reactor addon. I would like to check to see the reason for the delay and if
there is a rough estimate on when the haptic reactor might be ready to
ship, thank you.

Best regards,

Luis

conversations.body_text: Hi Luis Yu,     Your order has been shipped in two separate packages.  The power supply was delayed for two weeks due to product upgrades. We have now completed the upgrades and will arrange shipment within the next few days.  We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Should you have any questions, we will prioritize addressing them for you.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELK0677401052YQ
